overview:
Entrepreneur looking at opportunities being created with the up-coming merger of Social, Mobile and Cloud technologies.

Founder, CEO and Advisor to many startups in the Social, Mobile, Internet and Telecom areas. Three successful exits as Founder â€“ Veraz going public on NASDAQ, CyLAN acquired by Hifn and Internetware acquired by Symantec.

CMO for TiE Silicon Valley helping in marketing and sales of TiEcon 2011 & TiEcon 2012; one of the largest entrepreneur conferences in the world. Also worked as an Entrepreneur in residence at Lightspeed Venture Partners looking at companies in mobile, social and cloud areas.

Before getting into startups, worked for over 10 years in various marketing management and business development roles at Ascend/Lucent, Castelle, Telebit/Cisco, Sun Microsystems and 3Com.

Wrote three books on Internet related topics.

Specialties Building and growing companies, Strategy formulation, Marketing, Consummating large deals, M&A, Mentoring Entrepreneurs. Experienced in Mobile, Social and Cloud technologies.
